answers.answer: Yes. I have GD and my sugar is around 90 to 116 depending if I go by my diet. If its below 70 even after eating something you need to call your doctor. If it shoots up to 150 or higher after eating something or being active I would call the doctor as well

After eating it should be above 90 and with fasting it should drop. Some days mine are higher then 90 with fasting and some days lower then 70. When I eat it gose up to 100 or or 148 until I go work out then it drops and stays low. My doctor wants it to be below 90 when fasting and below 120 after meals

question: My chances of developing diabetes are high, both my parents have diabetes, I got tested at 10 weeks and got normal results, at 16 weeks I got another test (due to having glucose on my urine) and my one hr came back slightly elevated 156/140 and had to do the 3 hr and got normal results! Today I eat at 9 am, I had a sprite with my meal, and I decided to check my blood sugar with my mom's machine, and to my surprise my reading came 99 after 3 hrs, it is a normal number right?? I'm 27 weeks 3 days!
title: gestational diabetes??
